subject: Football
lead_paragraph: As soon as the Eagles’ Darren Sproles, listed at 5 feet 6 inches and 190 pounds, enters the game, he becomes the smallest player on the field. And the most dangerous.
snippet: As soon as the Eagles’ Darren Sproles, listed at 5 feet 6 inches and 190 pounds, enters the game, he becomes the smallest player on the field. And the most dangerous.
